interestingFacts: India is the world’s largest democracy.
The Kumbh Mela is visible from space due to the crowd size.
The U.S. has the world's largest economy.
Alaska has the longest coastline of any state.
Japan has more than 6,800 islands.
Tokyo is the most populated metropolitan area in the world.
Brazil is home to 60% of the Amazon rainforest.
Football (soccer) is the most popular sport.
Germany is Europe's largest economy.
It has over 1,000 varieties of sausages.
Australia is home to the Great Barrier Reef.
It has more kangaroos than people.
Canada has the longest international border (with the US).
It has more lakes than all other countries combined.
France is the most visited country in the world.
The Louvre is the world’s largest art museum.
The Great Wall of China is over 13,000 miles long.
Fortune cookies are actually from America, not China.
South Africa has 11 official languages.
It is the only country with 3 capitals.
